timeline.message: Feat(Azure Library): Create GET all method for work item types
Feat(Azure Library): Add GET method for a single work item type

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure we should be using a version type of *-preview?
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: There are several pieces of functionality that require using preview versions. Luckily these are not subject to change, but they may not be fully tested.
replies.author: gkillough
